original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color>$Skill_CD(3586)@ 施放兩個半月形劍氣沿著地表前後直線衝擊，對敵人造成$Skill_Str(3586)@武力傷害與$Skill_Int(3586)@智力傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color>$Skill_CD(3586)@ Cast two and a half moon-shaped sword energy to strike back and forth along the ground in a straight line, causing $Skill_Str(3586)@武力 Damage and $Skill_Int( 3586) @智力伤.
